task_parent_id = #{record.taskParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
task_name = #{record.taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_start_time = #{record.taskStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

complete_percent = #{record.completePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
task_state = #{record.taskState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manual_text = #{record.manualText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manual_pics = #{record.manualPics,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manual_attach = #{record.manualAttach,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

approve_status = #{record.approveStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into supervision_task_${enterpriseId} ( `task_parent_id`, `task_name`, `task_start_time`, `task_end_time`, `supervision_user_id`, `check_object_ids`, `create_time`, `task_state`, `business_type`, `sop_ids`, `priority`, task_grouping, first_approve, secondary_approve, third_approve, reminder_time_before_starting, reminder_time_before_end, supervision_handle_user_id, supervision_handle_user_name, approve_status ) values
( #{record.taskParentId}, #{record.taskName}, #{record.taskStartTime}, #{record.taskEndTime}, #{record.supervisionUserId}, #{record.checkObjectIds}, #{record.createTime}, #{record.taskState}, #{record.businessType}, #{record.sopIds}, #{record.priority}, #{record.taskGrouping}, #{record.firstApprove}, #{record.secondaryApprove}, #{record.thirdApprove}, #{record.reminderTimeBeforeStarting}, #{record.reminderTimeBeforeEnd}, #{record.supervisionHandleUserId}, #{record.supervisionHandleUserName}, #{record.approveStatus} )
mapper.update:
update supervision_task_${enterpriseId} set task_state = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.taskState},task_state)
END, complete_time = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.completeTime},complete_time)
END, submit_time = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.submitTime},submit_time)
END, handle_over_time_status = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.handleOverTimeStatus},handle_over_time_status)
END, current_node = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.currentNode},current_node)
END, approve_status = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.approveStatus},approve_status)
END where id in
#{record.id}

update supervision_task_${enterpriseId} set task_state = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN #{record.taskState}
END, cancel_status = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN #{record.cancelStatus}
END, submit_time = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.submitTime},submit_time)
END, complete_time = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.completeTime},complete_time)
END, handle_over_time_status = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.handleOverTimeStatus},handle_over_time_status)
END where id in
#{record.id}

update supervision_task_${enterpriseId} set supervision_handle_user_id = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.supervisionHandleUserId},supervision_handle_user_id)
END, supervision_handle_user_name = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.supervisionHandleUserName},supervision_handle_user_name)
END, first_approve = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.firstApprove},first_approve)
END, transfer_reassign_flag = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.transferReassignFlag},transfer_reassign_flag)
END, secondary_approve = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.secondaryApprove},secondary_approve)
END, third_approve = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.thirdApprove},third_approve)
END where id in
#{record.id}
mapper.select:
select from supervision_task_${enterpriseId} where task_parent_id = #{parentId}
and supervision_handle_user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and (handle_over_time_status = #{handleOverTimeStatus} or (task_state = 0 and handle_over_time_status = 0 and task_end_time < now()))
and ((handle_over_time_status = 0 AND task_state != 0) or (task_state=0 and task_end_time > now()) )
(task_state = 0 and cancel_status = 0)
( task_state = 1 and cancel_status = 0)
( task_state = 4 and cancel_status = 0)
( cancel_status = 1)
order by id desc

select
from supervision_task_${enterpriseId} where task_state = 0 and cancel_status = 0 and reminder_time_before_starting = #{reminderTimeBeforeStarting} and task_start_time <= now() and task_end_time >= now()

select
from supervision_task_${enterpriseId} where task_state = 0 and cancel_status = 0 and reminder_time_before_end = #{reminderTimeAfterEnd} and task_start_time <= now() and task_end_time >= now()

select
from supervision_task_${enterpriseId} where task_state = 1 and check_object_ids is null
